entries.arrival_phase_1: We are pinpointing the location of the Kuat Freighter now, stand by.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Location confirmed. Hurry over there and destroy that freighter. Be careful it's heavily guarded!
entries.assassinate_success: Excellent job! Get out of there pilot, the Empire will try to get revenge.
entries.escort_remaining: Tactical Computer: < Scans show target vessel escort terminated. %DI escort vessels remain. >
entries.escort_wiped_out: Tactical Computer: < Scans show target vessel escort terminated. No more escort vessels remain. >
entries.failed_escape: Blasted! It got away! Return to base immediately!
entries.quest_location_d: The Kuat freighter is on its way to the Imperial base in the Lok system.
entries.quest_target_d: Wait or search the nearby area of these coordinates and ambush the Kuat freighter when you find it. Although the freighter is well guarded, don't focus on its escort. All that matter is that the freighter is destroyed.
entries.title: Lok system: Destroy Kuat Freighter.
entries.title_d: The Kuat freighter is transporting something important to the Imperial base in the Lok system. Don't let it reach the base!
